content:
* **MLS listing or pending sales are not required**. If included, adjust active listing(s) to reflect list-to-sale price ratio based on 1004MC data if statistically relevant. Adjust pending sale(s) to reflect contract price if possible.
* In some markets, compliance with this requirement may not be possible due to lack of data, in which case an explanation is required. (Do not include non-comparable listings/pendings.)

MLS/Pendings: not required, adjust active to reflect list-to-sale, adjust pendings to contract price if possible, explanation required if not possible, do not include non-comparable.
